en.content: You feel a deepening unease about Emberhead and this day in particular.

text.content: Once you have attempted three of the options below, choose “Continue”.

zh.content: 你对烬头村感到越来越不安，今天尤为惶恐。

text.content: 一旦下面的选项你已经试过三个，选择“继续”。

text.zh: 搜索梅·莱德贝特的卧室

text.en: Go alone to the village hall
Take a closer look at the artisans’ courtyard
Spy on activity at the Beacon
Slip down to the east road and flee for good
text.zh: 沿东盘山路下山，溜之大吉
